name: Poncalypse
description:
Poncalypse.

The main idea is to twist the first game ever created, Pong. Now it's armed with guns to shoot out blocks. Multiplayer possible!

CONTROL:
1P = W, A, D
2P = Up Arrow, Down Arrow, Left Arrow

If you want to support my game dev journey, please buy the game!
Or you can buy me a ko-fi.

Have fun!
